title: Adds communication by means of a "computer network" to aggravated harassment in the second degree
summary: Adds communication by means of a computer network to aggravated harassment in the second degree; defines computer network to mean (a) a set of related devices connected to a computer communications facility, or (b) a complex of two or more computers, including related devices, connected by communicated facilities.
